billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Prevents landlords from receiving a financial windfall from major capital improvements funded by the New York state energy and research development authority
summary: Prevents landlords from receiving a financial windfall from major capital improvements funded by the New York State energy and research development authority.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting landlords from increasing rent for major capital improvements funded through state entities
